info_content:
Gömülü mesajı göremiyor musun?
O zaman bunu oku https://docs.emojiguardian.xyz/troubleshooting
content:
Sadece tuşları ve menüyü mü görüyorsun?
O zaman bunu oku https://docs.emojiguardian.xyz/troubleshooting

fields.name: {emoji_bot}Emoji Guardian Hakkında
fields.value:
> Emoji Guardian is a bot especially for emoji servers.
> With the Bot, you can do a lot with emojis like locking an emoji to a role and much more.

fields.name: {emoji_tools}How can I see the commands?
fields.value: > Click under the buttons on the select menu and select a command category.

fields.name: {emoji_support}How can I get support?
fields.value: > You can join [support server](https://discord.gg/EbBsuxVNYT) or you can DM `Lost Paul#3453` or `Danu#4422`

fields.name: {emoji_translate}Botun dilini nasıl değiştiririm?
fields.value:
> `/language set` komutunu kullanarak botun dilini değiştirebilirsin
> Orada dilin yok mu? O zaman çevirmeye başlayabilirsin. https://translate.emojiguardian.xyz/

options.label: Single emoji commands
options.description: Commands which work with only one emoji

options.label: Multiple emojis commands
options.description: Command which work with more than one emoji

options.label: Blacklist/Other commands
options.description: Blacklist commands and other commands than single and multiple emojis commands
